name: @fast_roi
author: AFNI Developers
description: Creates Atlas-based ROI masked in ANAT's original space. The script executes rapidly for realtime fMRI applications.

inputs.description: Symbolic atlas-based region name. Use repeated instances to specify a mask of numerous regions. Each region is assigned a power of 2 integer in the output mask.
inputs.name: Region

inputs.description: A user drawn ROI in standard (tlrc) space. This ROI gets added with the REGION ROI.
inputs.name: Drawn ROI

inputs.description: ANAT is the volume to be put in standard space. If ANAT is already in TLRC space, there is no need for -base option.
inputs.name: Anatomical Volume

inputs.description: Same as -anat, but indicates that the skull has been removed already.
inputs.name: Anatomical Volume No Skull

inputs.description: Name of the reference TLRC volume.
inputs.name: TLRC Base

inputs.description: The volume that defines the final ROI's grid.
inputs.name: ROI Grid

inputs.description: Prefix used to tag the names the ROIs output.
inputs.name: Prefix

inputs.description: Make TLRC transformation more robust. Use it if TLRC transform step fails.
inputs.name: Two-pass Flag

output-files.description: ROI output volume with the specified prefix.
output-files.name: ROI Output Volume
